word_mean: 钾：碱族金属元素，许多钾盐被用做药物。钾是一种软的银白色金属，熔点为58°F，原子序数19，原子量39.102，比重0.87，符号为K。钾是肌肉及其他大多数细胞(细胞内液)的主要正离子。另见pump项下的sodium-potassium pump

sentence.Network_en: These chemicals modulate the effect of potassium.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些化学物质可以调节钾的功效。

sentence.Network_en: Fruits, vegetables, and wholegrains are rich in potassium.
sentence.Network_cn: 水果、蔬菜和全谷物富含钾元素。

sentence.Network_en: No potassium did we find in this mineral.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这种矿石中我们没有发现钾.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from potash (earlier potass, from French potasse) + -ium

encyclopedia.content: 一种化学元素 。化学符号（K） ，原子序数 19，相对原子质量为39.0983，属周期系ⅠA族，为碱金属的成员。元素的英文名称来源于potash一词，含义是木灰碱。钾在地壳中的含量为2.59%，占第七位。在海水中，除了氯、钠、镁、硫、钙之外 ，钾的含量占第六位 。

entry.def: Potassium is a soft silvery-white chemical element, which occurs mainly in compounds. These compounds are used in making such things as glass, soap, and fertilizers.

means.word_mean: 1. a light soft silver-white metallic element of the alkali metal group; oxidizes rapidly in air and reacts violently with water; is abundant in nature in combined forms occurring in sea water and in carnallite and kainite and sylvite
